title: Three of Swords
description: An old houseboat, a hot young guy, a couple of murders, and more mysterious keys than you can shake a stick this is what awaits Gray Vecello after his grandfather, Graham, is killed picking up high blood pressure pills.A letter Graham left behind sends Gray and his unexpected ally, Cooper Key, on a journey downriver in an attempt to unravel the mystery surrounding an unknown treasure. On the way, they encounter both friends and enemies, one of whom will target Gray and Cooper for death. One thing working in Grayâ€™s he has the sight, just as Graham had, but will it be enough to save them both?First book of the Precog in Peril series.
author: Theo Fenraven
